WorkItem.ClosedComment: Resilience gems aren't relevant unless you are a tank, and shouldn't be used even then as Defense is the correct stat
WorkItem.Description: This gem, although it is in the database, does not show up under gemmings. By example, when I go to customize gemmings on an item, it is not in the list to select from.

Comments.Message: That's because it's not relevant, and/or it's filtered out. Likely the former.

Rawr is only really a relevant stat for tanks.  If you're not a tank and you have Kharma's Grace as a gem in your PvE gear, you're doing something wrong :P
If you are a tank, let us know what class you are and we can investigate
I think you mean Resilience, not Rawr. :)
Haha, yes I do.  The forums ate my original (longer) comment, and I was quick to try to retype it.  Sorry!
